products.name: Amplimove Trainer
products.description: Reach your peak performance with the adidas Amplimove Trainer for men. Lightweight and cushioned, these shoes provide reliable stability to give you the support you need for all gym training activities. The soft padding keeps your feet comfortable during intense workouts. With their sleek design and timeless muted colour, these trainers also make a statement in any gym setting. Textile and synthetic upper. Lace-up closure. Round-toe silhouette. Textile lining and insole. Rubber outsole

products.name: Terrex Trailmaker 2
products.description: Make your most of outdoor adventures by wearing adidas® Outdoor Terrex Trailmaker 2 shoes. With a lightweight and breathable design, they provide reliable support and cushioning to keep you going. They are made of synthetic/textile upper, textile lining, and removable textile footbed. A rounded toe and lace closure ensures secure fit while EVA midsole provides supportive traction. Rubber outsole

products.name: Terrex Soulstride
products.description: No matter wherever the trail takes you, the adidas® Outdoor Terrex Soulstride shoes have always got your back. Running shoes featuring breathable mesh upper. Textile lining with cushioned footbed. Lightweight EVA midsole. Classic round toe silhouette. Padded collar and tongue for maximum comfort. Raised sidewalls for enhanced stability. Iconic three-stripe detailing on the quarter. Traditional lace-up closure for a snug fit. flexible rubber outsole. Imported

products.name: Terrex Free Hiker
products.description: Designed with an EVA stabilization frame and an external heel clip for added comfort and support, the adidas® Outdoor Terrex Free Hiker 2.0 Low shoes are a must-have for your hiking adventures. The BOOST midsole of these shoes offers superior cushioning over rocky surfaces while the lace-up closure provides a perfect fit. These hiking shoes are lightweight and come with a protective toe cap. Get ready for your adventures by wearing these lace-up shoes. Recycled mesh upper with heel overlays. Removable textile footbed and textile lining. Regular fit. Stretchy knit collar keeps the debris and dirt out. Heel pull loop. Brand detailing on the vamp. Round toe. Continental™ rubber outsole offers improved traction over wet and dry terrain. Imported

products.name: Cloudgo
products.description: Launch into running with next-level comfort wearing the On Cloudgo sneaker. Engineered polyester mesh plus a closed outsole. Round toe silhouette. Lace-up closure. CloudTec® for soft cushioning and great energy return. TPU Speedboard® and forefoot rocker for smooth rolling. Heel-to-Toe Drop: 11mm. Helion™ superfoam offers responsiveness plus comfort

products.name: Solarmotion 24
products.description: Step up your sporty style and experience lasting comfort wearing adidas® Golf Solarmotion 24 Sneakers to your running or training sessions. The sneakers are crafted with a textile & synthetic upper and feature a round toe shape and lace-up detailing. The signature three-stripe branding on the side panels adds both style and authenticity. Slow resilient sockliner. Lightstrike midsole. Gripmore + rubber spikeless outsole. Imported

products.name: GameCourt 2
products.description: Great for Pickleball and Tennis. Perfect your game in these men's adidas tennis shoes. They're made with a breathable, flexible mesh upper to keep you cool and competitive. Padding in the heel locks you in for long rallies, and the durable Adiwear outsole lets you clock up the hours on court as you hone your game. Men's tennis shoes with a padded collar and a durable outsole. BREATHABLE UPPER: Open mesh upper is breathable and flexible. LIGHTWEIGHT MIDSOLE: EVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning. Slip-on style with lace panels. Round toe. Elevated flat silhouette. Padded heel design. Contrasting branding stripes on the upper

products.name: adizero Afterburn 9 NMV
products.description: A new-age pair of baseball cleats, the adidas® adizero Afterburn 9 NMV Baseball Cleats come with a lace-up design for a secure fit. These round-toe design cleats are crafted from a soft upper with LIGHTLOCK system to keep your feet stable while you move. The metal studs offer superior traction on the field and enhance your performance. Usage: Baseball. Regular fit. LIGHTLOCK upper with Sprintskin synthetic overlays. Textile lining. Widened lacing system. Sock-like fit. Lightstrike cushioning. Cleated synthetic outsole

products.name: Copa Pure II.4
products.description: Score big everytime with the utmost comfort and style wearing adidas® Copa Pure II.4 Flexible Ground Stud Shoes that come with a synthteic upper, textile lining, and comfortable footbed. The shoes are designed with a round toe shape, lace-up closure, and three-stripe branding on the side panels. Synthetic outsole with studs

products.name: Cloudrunner
products.description: The On Cloudrunner sneaker will give you the confidence to go further. CloudTec® cushioning in ultralight Zero-Gravity foam. Textile and synthetic upper. Textile lining and removable insole. Synthetic sole. Breathable mesh upper. Round toe silhouette. Lace-up closure. Heel-to-Toe Drop: 9mm

products.name: Pickleball
products.description: Offering enhanced comfort and performance, the adidas Pickleball shoes are perfect for all-day wear. These lightweight and responsive shoes are an ideal choice for both pickleball and tennis. The herringbone pattern on the outsole gives them a stylish look. Featuring a low-cut design for better agility, these sports shoes are crafted with a BOUNCE midsole that will help you stay in the game. The lace-up closure of these athletic shoes provides a custom fit. Synthetic upper with perforation holes. Removable textile upper with textile lining. Chunky platform heel. Pull tab at the back. Round toe. Outsole is strategically placed with rubber for increased grip and enhanced court feel. Imported

products.name: Cloudmonster
products.description: Experience monster-level bounce and energy return wearing the On Cloudmonster sneaker. Big CloudTec® for a big rebound sensation. Round toe silhouette. Lace-up closure. Powerful Speedboard® for huge energy return. Forward-rolling, effortless momentum. Super-soft landings with Helion™ superfoam
